Reviews.Title: “a wonderful and charming hotel”
Reviews.Author: Limori
Reviews.Content: husband thoroughly enjoyed stay hotel junior suite excellent clean spacious staff friendly helpful breakfast enjoyable good variety hotel excellent location close restaurants public transport prior arriving hotel travelling couple months 9 day stay refreshed us gave us much needed energy continue travels great experience would recomend victoria palace

Reviews.Title: “Great City Centre Hotel”

Reviews.Content: chose hotel basis reviews tripadvisor wife experience actually write review hotel situated 300 meters subway station ideal us since public transport public transport system paris specifically subway fantastic way hotel consider top class environment genuine friendliness without staff simply ready willing whatever took make us happy never way next happy surprise room floor top floor hotel found large room warmly decorated immediately important feeling coming home something wife truly treasure long days sight seeing bathroom large bath looked superb well another happy surprise rich breakfast buffet every kind food mine quite lot even add little bit croissants tasted 4 hours old quite fresh enough city paris every corner get fresh bread never ever excellent experience best thing hotel people within certain age sense british understand others go get faulty towers understand person annoying fact polite helpful funny guy made day every morning little hint friendly one get extra coffee without asked wearing white working breakfast think end rather long review another positive note hotel go back paris would think searching place stay

Reviews.Title: “wonderful hotel”

Reviews.Content: disagree previous review found hotel pleasant nice quiet breakfast thoroughly enjoyable fact found stay staff helpful usually stay hotels travel agent recommended us hotel clients stay came fully recommended gave us feeling well france

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel part of excellent package”

Reviews.Content: stayed victoria palace 6 nights june 2 connecting rooms husband 17 year old son connecting room booked rooms hotel manager could accomodating delightful beginning booking rooms wonderful throughout stay even booked hotel nice personally rooms spacious lovely location perfect within walking distance everything wanted see done extensive research looking hotel paris vp even better anticipated absolutely stay return paris

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT”
Reviews.Author: tayock
Reviews.Content: daughter 5 year old wonderful week vp last march yes arrived early wait requested early arrival everyone polite kept us expected time would able get room room lovely provided nice small bed left turned beds even laid paris book bed well spacious marble bathroom beautiful found staff helpful cheerful spoke english well ate eggs almost every day found right fact thought breakfast wonderful value also enjoyed glass wine lovely lounge every day quiet perfect place relax long day sightseeing daughters second stay vp would stay downside little way positive aspects far

Reviews.Title: “an average , well run hotel”
Reviews.Author: rnlg1967
Reviews.Content: family four adults appreciated courtesy efficiency friendliness experienced recent eight day stay victoria palace stayed many wonderful hotels us europe rarely felt comfortable well taken care felt staff went way every day help us feel welcome enjoy paris much appreciated patient requests help matter late made silly might concierge arranged difficult get restaurant reservations excellent tours great suggestions small terrific local places dinner loved quiet side street close 2 metro lines shopping hotels major tourist large size ambience rooms breakfast bar helpful cheerful staff didnâ€™t really even notice extensive hall way renovation work quite mind sign truly great hotel welcome comfortable feel vp one best

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful hotel ! We loved it !”
Reviews.Author: FlowerLover77
Reviews.Content: teenage daughter stayed victoria palace 4 nights long day weekend great experience certainly go back booked hotel part package offered one airlines given quality hotel great value room large european standards comfortable clean quite charming many thoughtful touches 2 luggage plenty hangers high quality robes linens bathroom quite luxurious general say definately high 4 star experience seems real hospitality hotel arrived early well check time quickly made welcome shown room throughout stay members staff pleasantly helpful recommendations directions etc moreover daughter early sunday morning overnight front desk staff first assisted finding open pharmacy taxi take back daughter seem getting better secured english speaking within hour made house call hotel happily daughter within day hotel way sent tray light ordered refused charge finally 2 pluses deserve mention buffet breakfast good indeed included room rate also location excellant easy walk blvd garden right around corner

Reviews.Title: “Gorgeous hotel, loved the location!”
Reviews.Author: pmode
Reviews.Content: wife stayed victoria palace 7 nights late august early september friend recommended hotel booking checked reviews trip advisor certainly disappointed arrived found staff helpful attentive polite particularly gentleman breakfast victoria palace wonderful room great location perfect â€“ catch buses metro also nearby shops restaurants locals shop eat also convenience store 50 metres hotel overwhelming positive reviews victoria palace received trip advisor believe hotel deserves hotel true gem definitely stay return paris anne peter australia

Reviews.Title: “Terrific Hotel, We loved our stay!”
Reviews.Author: kingbingo1
Reviews.Content: wife stayed victoria palace week attending conference absolutely loved rooms quite large european hotel bathroom luxurious large well one separate also large room toilet go another room wash hands minor inconvenience room kept immaculately clean staff friendly spoke english hotel located 5 minute walk north montparnasse able walk easily le bon museum area eiffel tower addition large station montparnasse two tube stops within 5 minute walk hotel area mostly residential quite bit shopping rue de rennes major cross street near hotel found quiet touristy got near montparnasse breakfast included spectacular cant find good food spread theres something seriously wrong stay could better recommend hotel highly

Reviews.Title: “petite and perfect”
Reviews.Author: pzrad
Reviews.Content: arrived paris early morning flight usa went check victoria palace room ready quickly accommodated us wonderful welcome tourists room impeccably clean large bathroom lots closets hotel staff highly professional spoke english well answered every question guides maps surrounding neighborhood interesting useful hotel located quiet area paris close metro station quiet hotel nonsmoking public areas including bar breakfast american highly recommend victoria palace

Reviews.Title: “beautiful”
Reviews.Author: mrosado
Reviews.Content: enjoyed oldfashioned parisian experience offered hotel baby welcomed staff high chair crib available us extra charge pleased reduced fee got booking online conditions breakfast included staff allowed mom eat breakfast room baby slept dad ate complete meal downstairs eggs meat offered breakfast room location fabulous left bank like us every trip jardin de luxembourg hotel energy stay victoria palace

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel with perfect people”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: booked stay victoria palace hotel paris france via united reading variety reviews luxury hotel providing excellent service needs met hotel room large european standards beds comfortable room quiet importantly staff hotel paid attention met needs may wonderful hotel great one easily walk many sites musee gardens latin quarter notre dame musee dorsay louvre saint german du etc additionally wonderful eateries within steps hotel breakfast buffet wonderful double excellent hotel bar fun welcoming guests look forward staying hotel upon next visit paris

Reviews.Title: “A triple-threat hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: researching trip advisor chose victoria palace reviews price long flight little sleep night left pleased cool quiet room service good relaxed victoria palace yes one reviewer wrote eggs runny breakfast average found true 4 5 hotels stayed france italy glad included package breakfast expensive alot walking due location didnt mind nice stay nice little bar enter great nightcap also charge use internet computer rest hotels beware french keyboard help need wasnt best hotel felt good value money

Reviews.Title: “Loved this modern hotel wiht a touch of past Luxury”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: fiance early stayed victoria palace first stay paris booked hotel surprise birthday paid money especially wanted luxurious hotel disappointed past hotel pretty good area easily accessible restaurants street hotel full shops open 7pm pleased reception greeted us smart lady reception polite us room room 606 decent size carpet well worn decor taste old fashioned hotel mini bar snacks expensive fridge didnt work flat screen tv nice could find 2 english channels france worth look bed quite hard made much difference us sleeping always tired care busy hard get room temperature require especially night always either warm cold safe room free use wardrobe came dressing gowns slippers bathroom nice made marble 3 mirrors one full length large mirror sink close mirror shaving quite point found difficult get plugs sink bath pretty good hair dryer selection gel body lotion bathroom water majority 2 days staying given notice offered compensation kind didnt mind could large selection breakfast found scrambled eggs runny fruit fruit basket staff good whereas others unhelpful asked good chinese restaurants area given map told thought one corner couldnt tell us called thought one wasnt also asked taxi booked certain time went outside meter already 10 euros asked reception said paris ring taxi charged ring asked rang 15 minutes earlier asked shoulders asked would anything said time got back taxi gone even choice get needed get airport also member staff came room 2 occasions didnt hear knock even though please disturb sign cleaners come room regardless sign well warned visiting paris good base quiet part city without far away generally nice hotel found combination metro walking perfect us allowed us see everything wanted short time day metro pass euros allows get around paris much quicker walking id recommend good metro guide makes travelling around much easier also booking hotel check around websites good deals paid lot less euros night advertised overall paris beautiful place visit would advise anyone go see even though found many french people rude sure culture dont like tourists

Reviews.Title: “Pampered in Paris”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: four night stay hotel end july stayed paris many times know paris well best experience booked hotel hotel connect online good rate 4 star hotel paris good value distance seine minutes bus four routes travel rue de rennes stops 3 minutes walk hotel montparnasse metro 5 minutes walk tell really centre city easy access transport experience much better value stay area like right next tourist attractions case since paris city always travel distance see sights even get hotel next louvre still journey la eiffel tower side street location gets good nights sleep well away otherwise city noise family group requested twin room double room adjacent given room one entrance lobby two separate doors leading two separate rooms private facilities quality decor outstanding recent refurbishment used wear tear heavy tourist use style every attention detail makes charming different bland chain hotels taking paris cleanliness high standard see house touring hotel almost time day happen checking rooms work done staff reception service personnel immaculately dressed extremely helpful welcoming buffet breakfast good indeed wide choice european food plenty healthy options lots fresh fruit also traditional bacon eggs mean american taste pancakes waffles catered hotels would find better price often much basic several cafes restaurants within short walk hotel prefer eat locally overall view hotel excellent value every sense

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”

Reviews.Content: returned 3 night stay victoria palace booked room hotel stays based reviews trip advisor plus side staff terrific gave us incredible restaurants tips every evening also great calling us cabs answering question side hotel terrific area walk hotels street main street see mcdonalds street also great distance visit every thing required cab ride also hotel frankly carpets stained room updated would fine inexpensive euros expecting especially stayed another place 200 euros earlier year much elegant central location

Reviews.Title: “Superb Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: emtf
Reviews.Content: nice room chocolates nights look feel great location one best breakfasts ever seem staff helpfull quiet one word excellent like aware lived hotel period time

Reviews.Title: “Loved It”
Reviews.Author: sdrawkcabekiM
Reviews.Content: stayed victoria palace hotel 5 nights april 2007 years stayed many different paris hotels definately one prefer staying left bank overly touristy areas victoria palace nicely located quiet street rue de rennes although less touristy area still easy walking distance musee de jardin du luxembourg st germain des notre dame etc wife liked shopping area around hotel also many good restaurants cafes nearby lively street market blocks away blvd certain mornings stayed jr suite queen bed bed daughter room spacious enough accomodate three us comfortably decor traditional fabric wall nice marble bathroom good hot breakfast included room price lobby sitting room bar area comfortable really cant think anything negative stay would definately stay next time paris
